sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM YETA3120 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3120 ( EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , CNCL_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNCL_NAME , CNCL_RSNO , CNCL_STDT , CNCL_EDDT , CNCL_ITRO , CNCL_RDMT , CNCL_PRPL , CNCL_ITRT , CNCL_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(CNCL_SQNO)+1,1) FROM YETA3120 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #cnclName# , #cnclRsno# , #cnclStdt# , #cnclEddt# , #cnclItro# , ((NVL(#cnclPrpl#,0) + NVL(#cnclItrt#,0)) , #cnclPrpl# , #cnclItrt# , (( ( NVL(#cnclPrpl#,0) + NVL(#cnclItrt#,0)) * 0.4)) , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3120 SET EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , CNCL_SQNO=#cnclSqno# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CNCL_NAME=#cnclName# , CNCL_RSNO=#cnclRsno# , CNCL_STDT=#cnclStdt# , CNCL_EDDT=#cnclEddt# , CNCL_ITRO=#cnclItro# , CNCL_RDMT=((NVL(#cnclPrpl#,0) + NVL(#cnclItrt#,0)) , CNCL_PRPL=#cnclPrpl# , CNCL_ITRT=#cnclItrt# , CNCL_DUAM=(((NVL(#cnclPrpl#,0) + NVL(#cnclItrt#,0)) * 0.4) , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND CNCL_SQNO=#cnclSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3120 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND CNCL_SQNO=#cnclSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YETA3120 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , CNCL_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNCL_NAME , CNCL_RSNO , CNCL_STDT , CNCL_EDDT , CNCL_ITRO , CNCL_RDMT , CNCL_PRPL , CNCL_ITRT , CNCL_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3120 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND CNCL_SQNO=#cnclSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS SETT_GBNM , CNCL_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNCL_NAME , CNCL_RSNO , CNCL_STDT , CNCL_EDDT , CNCL_ITRO , CNCL_RDMT , CNCL_PRPL , CNCL_ITRT , CNCL_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3120 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , CNCL_SQNO DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3120 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , CNCL_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNCL_NAME , CNCL_RSNO , CNCL_STDT , CNCL_EDDT , CNCL_ITRO , CNCL_RDMT , CNCL_PRPL , CNCL_ITRT , CNCL_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3120 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_RVYY = #searchKeyword#
SETT_GBCD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , CNCL_SQNO DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3120 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_RVYY = #searchKeyword#
SETT_GBCD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
